title: Ready-to-Move Studio Perfect for Remote Workers in Kamienny Potok
description: This stylish studio apartment offers 32 sqm of open-plan, sun-filled living space laced with modern finishes. Enjoy a compact yet thoughtfully appointed modern kitchen, a separate bathroom with contemporary fixtures, and in-unit laundry facilities. The building features a solar-powered energy system, dedicated bicycle storage, and an inviting residents' lounge ideal for relaxing or socializing after work.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the medium-urban neighborhood of Kamienny Potok, this location offers a vibrant—yet peaceful—urban lifestyle. Close proximity to the city center ensures a dynamism perfect for young professionals, while pet-friendly green areas and a burgeoning community vibe invite a healthy, active routine. With numerous bike lines and reliable public transportation, commuting is effortless.
lifestyle_benefits: simple walk/bike ride to city center
target_buyer: A young remote-working professional or student looking for affordable independence and an active, flexible urban lifestyle.
market_positioning: An attractively priced studio in a growing neighborhood, offering more amenities and sustainable features than comparably priced options in central Sopot; perfect for digital nomads and eco-conscious buyers.
